entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
